idea-plugin.name: Doclin
idea-plugin.description:
Real-Time Commenting
Developers can comment on and discuss code in real-time. Comments are stored safely in the cloud, preventing clutter in the git repository.

🤖 Automatic Knowledge Base Creation
As developers discuss code in Doclin, it creates a knowledge base without any manual effort required for writing documentation.

📝 Better Documentation
Sometimes documentation cannot be avoided. Using Doclin's rich text editor, developers can leave detailed explanations in the code.

🏃 Always up-to-date
Doclin automatically keeps documentation up to date by flagging it when the code changes.

🔒 No Access To Git Required
We do not require access to your git repository, nor do we store any sensitive information about your git repository.
